column1: Kata Robata////Yuzu Salmon Carpaccio($8):  This one is just amazing mixture of flavor.  Thinly sliced salmon pieces are laid out and there are crunchy fish
column3: dried citrus (maybe kumquat?) and what is that white sauce!?  It is soooo good.  Try to put all of them on a salmon slice and fold it into 3.  It will become just a bite size.
